review: I honestly hope they can do a Winter Soldier solo film or something to that effect in the future. Kinda like what they did with Bourne Legacy. A spinoff of the Captain America films where they take an equally badass character in The Winter Soldier and have him go up against his own villains and such.👍👍
trailer looked way cooler than the actual show.
I'm loving this show, so far. The character development is what makes it so good. I hope they continue with marvel, live action, shows.
one of the best trailer cuts. woow the show was amazing too loved it
Sebastian in SO HOT in this. Bucky is great written and acted. Hats off!

This show is so good. I got up in the middle of the night so I could watch each episode as soon as they came out, I listen to the soundtrack, and I've watched the episodes more than a hundred times in total. This show means so much to me, and one of my biggest wishes is that Marvel would make a season two. But if they don't put Bucky in Captain America 4 I will have an existential crisis and cry for weeks. Bucky has been a big part in each of the Cap movies so far, and just because we have a new Cap, it doesn't mean that they can change that.
This show is beast. I like how they Marvel made it for Adult audience with language & enemies that were defeated was great screen play!

I hate this series. It's racially charged, anti-American, anti-white, politically correct. They went backwards to tell the story of a Black man who was Captain America in the 1950s and apparently treated harshly by the Government, yadda, yadda, yadda.
